articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: Dow futures rally as Trump softens tone on trade war again while first tech earnings and inflation report loom - Fortune
articles.description: On Tuesday, Netflix and Texas Instruments are due. On Wednesday, Tesla and IBM will report, while Intel is scheduled for Thursday.
articles.content: U.S. stock futures pointed higher on Sunday evening as Wall Street looks ahead to a big week for the U.S.-China trade war, corporate earnings, and economic data.President Donald Trump again set the t… [+2046 chars]
